tweet-count-day: select extract(dow from to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY$$)) as day, extract(hour from to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS " + 0000 " YYYY$$)) + 1 as hour, count(id) as value from tweets group by 1,2 order by 1,2 asc;
tweet-count-day-7: select extract(dow from to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY$$)) as day, extract(hour from to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY$$)) as hour, count(id) as value from tweets where to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY$$) > current_date - interval $$7$$ day group by 1,2 order by 1,2 asc;
tweet-count-day-14: select extract(dow from to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY$$)) as day, extract(hour from to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY$$)) as hour, count(id) as value from tweets where to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY$$) > current_date - interval $$14$$ day and to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY$$) < current_date - interval $$7$$ day group by 1,2 order by 1,2 asc;
tweet-count-day-month: select extract(dow from to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY$$)) as day, extract(hour from to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY$$)) as hour, count(id) as tweets from tweets where to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY$$) > current_date - interval $$1$$ month and to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY$$) < current_date - interval $$21$$ day group by 1,2 order by 1,2 asc;
tweet-count: select count(*) as count from tweets;
hashtag-count: select lower(text) as hashtag, count(text) as Tweets from hashtags group by hashtag order by tweets desc;
hashtag-top-10: select lower(text) as text, count(text) as count from hashtags group by text order by count desc limit 10;
hashtag-top-20: select lower(text) as text, count(text) as count from hashtags group by text order by count desc limit 20;
hashtag-top-100: select lower(text) as text, count(text) as count from hashtags group by text order by count desc limit 100;
bubble-chart-a1: select li.frente_bloque as group, li.subloque as subgroup, um.screen_name as name, count(id_user_mentions) as value from user_mentions um left join candidatos_cuentas cc on (lower(cc.screen_name) = lower(um.screen_name)) left join users us on (lower(cc.screen_name) = lower(us.screen_name)) left join listas li on (lower(li.candidato) = lower(cc.candidato)) group by 1,2,3 desc having count(id_user_mentions) > 500 order by 4 desc;
bubble-chart-a2: select CASE WHEN  (li.frente_bloque is null or li.frente_bloque = 'Completar') THEN (CASE WHEN (li.subloque = '-' or li.subloque is null) then 'Sin Asignar' ELSE li.subloque  END) ELSE li.frente_bloque END as frente_bloque, li.subloque, um.screen_name, count(id_user_mentions) from user_mentions um left join  candidatos_cuentas cc on (lower(cc.screen_name) = lower(um.screen_name)) left join users us on (lower(cc.screen_name) = lower(us.screen_name)) left join listas li on (lower(li.candidato) = lower(cc.candidato)) group by 1,2,3 having  count(id_user_mentions)>500 order by 4 desc;
bubble-chart-b1: select can.frente as frente ,can.subbloque as bloque, can.candidato as candidato, count(*) as menciones, can.screen_name as "screenName", can.candidato as "nombreCandidato" from user_mentions um join ws_candidatos can on (can.screen_name = um.screen_name) where can.id_provincia in ({idProvincias}) and can.id_frente in ({idFrentes}) and can.id_subbloque in ({idBloques}) and can.id in ({idCandidatos}) group by 1,2,3,5,6 order by 4 desc;
day-hour-heatmap: select to_char(to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS +0000 YYYY$$), 'D') as day, extract(hour from to_timestamp(created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS  + 0000  YYYY$$)) +1 as hour, count(id) as value from tweets group by 1,2 order by 1,2 asc;
actividad-usuario-interes: select to_char(to_timestamp(tw.created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS +0000 YYYY$$), 'D') as day, extract(hour from to_timestamp(tw.created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS  + 0000  YYYY$$)) +1 as hour, count(tw.id) as value from tweets tw join users us on (us.id_user = tw.id_user) join candidatos_cuentas cc on (lower(cc.screen_name) = lower(us.screen_name)) join listas li on (lower(cc.candidato) = lower(li.candidato))  group by 1,2 order by 1,2 asc;
actividad-cambiemos: select to_char(to_timestamp(tw.created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS +0000 YYYY$$), 'D') as day, extract(hour from to_timestamp(tw.created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS  + 0000  YYYY$$)) +1 as hour, count(tw.id) as value from tweets tw join users us on (us.id_user = tw.id_user) join candidatos_cuentas cc on (lower(cc.screen_name) = lower(us.screen_name)) join listas li on (lower(cc.candidato) = lower(li.candidato)) where li.frente_bloque = 'Cambiemos' group by 1,2 order by 1,2 asc;
actividad-unidadc: select to_char(to_timestamp(tw.created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS +0000 YYYY$$), 'D') as day, extract(hour from to_timestamp(tw.created_at, $$Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS  + 0000  YYYY$$)) +1 as hour, count(tw.id) as value from tweets tw join users us on (us.id_user = tw.id_user) join candidatos_cuentas cc on (lower(cc.screen_name) = lower(us.screen_name)) join listas li on (lower(cc.candidato) = lower(li.candidato)) where li.frente_bloque = 'Unidad Ciudadana' group by 1,2 order by 1,2 asc;
treemap-1: select to_char (to_date(tw.created_at, 'Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY'), 'W') || ',' || extract( month from to_date(tw.created_at, 'Dy mon DD HH24:MI:SS "+0000" YYYY'))   as date ,st.frente_bloque as frente ,cc.candidato as candidato ,count(um.id_tweet) as q_mentions from user_mentions um join tweets tw on (um.id_tweet = tw.id_tweet)     join candidatos_cuentas cc on (lower(um.screen_name) = lower(cc.screen_name) ) join st_listas st  on (lower(cc.candidato) = lower(st.candidato)) group by 1,2,3;
lista-frentes: select frente as name, id as id from ws_frentes;
filtro-bloque: select subbloque as name, id as id from ws_subbloques where id_frente in ({idFrentes});
filtro-provincias: select pv.provincia as name, pv.id as id from ws_provincias pv join ws_candidatos can on (can.id_provincia = pv.id) where can.id_frente in ({idFrentes}) and can.id_subbloque in ({idBloques}) group by 1,2 order by 1 asc;
filtro-candidatos: select candidato as name, id as id, screen_name as "screenName" from ws_candidatos where id_frente in ({idFrentes}) and id_subbloque in ({idBloques}) and id_provincia in ({idProvincias});
